#text=Needing to go across town , I decided to take a public bus rather than drive .
#text=I had no bus tokens to pay for the fare so I walked to the bus station downtown and bought some .
#text=Then I got a bus schedule and looked for a bus that was going across town .
#text=So I went out to the platform where a lot of other people were waiting for their buses .
#text=I found where number 6 stopped and got in the line .
#text=When the bus came I had my token out and ready to deposit in the fare collection box .
#text=Then I went and found a seat .
#text=I was going to sit next to a woman that looked like she was going to work .
#text=The bus meandered through the city and finally got me to my destination .
